Title: Japan Home Healthcare Market Analysis
Content: The Japan home healthcare market was valued at $22.4 Bn in 2022 and is estimated to expand at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 8.43% from 2022 to 2030 and will reach $43.07 Bn in 2030. One of the main reasons propelling the growth of this market is the introduction of newer technologies, The increased prevalence of chronic ailments. The market is segmented by equipment and by services. Some key players in this market are Doctor mate, Medtronic Japan, A&D Company, and Toto.
